channel.title: OSS Hiscores
channel.description:
http://hcojust.in/rs/hiscores.php?player=MorbidDoctor
Site should be pretty self-explanatory :rolleyes:
For those who want it, http://services.runescape.com/m=hiscore_oldschool/index_lite.ws?player= will give you the comma delimited hiscores just like EoCScape. It does include placeholders for minigames so I have a feeling those will be coming soon enough.
"Mandatory" picture: [img]http://i.imgur.com/HvBpyW1.png?1[/img]
